interpreter.runSuccess: Script ran successfully! Click the play button to hear your music.
interpreter.runFailed: There are one or more errors in your script. Look at the console for details.
interpreter.noimport: is undefined. Perhaps "from earsketch import *" is missing.

dawservice.effecttrackwarning: Adding an effect track before the audio track is created

esaudio.stringindex: Beat string index is out of bounds
esaudio.nonlistRangeError: beat strings can only contain 0, +, or -
esaudio.tempoRange: Tempo must be between 45 bpm and 220 bpm
esaudio.analysisTimeTooShort: The analysis time window (endTime - startTime) is too small

user.scriptsuccess: List of scripts in Load script list successfully updated.
user.scriptcloud: Script successfully saved to the cloud.
user.allscriptscloud: All unsaved scripts successfully saved to the cloud.
user.badsharelink: Error opening a script. The share link in the URL may be wrong.
user.teachersLink: Teacher account requires your full name and a unique email address for logging in to the TEACHERS website. Please provide them in the Edit Profile menu in the account options.
user.infoRequired: First Name, Last Name, and E-mail Address are required for a teacher account.
user.emailConflict: Failed to update the user profile. Please check that this E-mail address is not used in other EarSketch accounts. (Hint: If you cannot remember such user account, try logging out and choose Reset Account -> Forgot Your Password? option. This lets you retrieve the account tied to the E-mail address.
user.teacherSiteLoginError: Error logging in to the TEACHERS website!
user.promptFixAtTeacherSite: . Please try changing the user information in Edit Profile.
user.teachersPageNoAccess: You must have a teacher account to access this page. You can request one at the CONTACT page.

download.script: Save your code as a text file on your computer.
download.wav: Save your song as WAV audio file (uses more disk space, higher audio quality).
download.mp3: Save your song as an MP3 file (uses less disk space, lower audio quality).
download.multitrack: Save each track of your song as a separate WAV file (for importing into a digital audio workstation program like GarageBand, Logic, Pro Tools, Reaper, FruityLoops, Cubase, Audition, or Live).
download.rendererror: There was a problem rendering the script.

changepassword.pwdauth: Old password wrong. Password could not be changed.
changepassword.pwdfail: Your password confirmation is not the same as your password.
changepassword.pwdlength: Your password is too short. Passwords must be at least 5 characters long.

downloadprotecteddata.servertimeout: The was some problem at our end. Please try again.
downloadprotecteddata.unexpectederror: Unexpected error. Please try again or report error from the options menu.

forgotpassword.fail: The email address you entered is not valid or is not associated with an EarSketch account.
forgotpassword.success: Please check your e-mail for a message from EarSketch to reset your password.

uploadcontroller.freesoundSelection: Please select a sound from the Freesound search results...
uploadcontroller.wavsel: Please select a valid audio file ...
uploadcontroller.invalidfile: is not a valid audio file ...
uploadcontroller.undefinedconstant: Undefined is not a valid constant...
uploadcontroller.alreadyused: is already used as a constant
uploadcontroller.tempointeger: Tempo must be a positive number...
uploadcontroller.bigsize: Sorry, the audio file cannot be longer than 30 seconds.
uploadcontroller.nosupport: Sorry, Quick Record is currently only supported in Chrome, and partially supported in FireFox.
uploadcontroller.chrome_mic_noaccess: You have blocked access to your microphone. To enable recording, click the camera icon in your browser's address bar and select 'ask if earsketch.gatech.edu wants to access your microphone'. Then try the Quick Record feature again and be sure to allow microphone access.
uploadcontroller.ff_mic_noaccess: You have blocked access to your microphone. To enable recording, click the microphone icon in your browser's address bar to share your microphone with EarSketch. If no microphone icon appears, click the earth icon to unblock microphone access. Then try the Quick Record feature again and be sure to share microphone access.
